section.title: Leap.Unity.RuntimeGizmos.RuntimeGizmoToggle Class Reference

para.para: This class controls the display of all the runtime gizmos that are either attatched to this gameObject, or a child of this gameObject. Enable this component to allow the gizmos to be drawn, and disable it to hide them.
